backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, authorization checks, match data structures, and preparation for data migration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding agSessions to persisted state while preserving existing user profiles and match history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short textual summaries of key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring themes, auth gate, layout, and all application routes.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Button component representing a numbered APA ball with state-based styles and scoring value.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types and helpers for ball values, labels, and calculating rack point totals.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Interactive 9‑ball rack scoring panel managing ball states, innings, defensive shots, and auto‑dead logic before reporting rack results.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match summary including winner, match points, and detailed stats for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Custom hook tracking active player, inning counts, and turn flow with methods to update state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gate component that blocks content until identity loads, showing login or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save a profile name via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, login button, routed content outlet, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button with confirmation dialog for deleting a match and navigating afterward.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog to confirm ending and saving a match session with loading states.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a clickable match summary card with mode label, date, players, and mode-specific summary info.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Renders a navigation card with icon, description, and button to start a new game mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, matches, and Accepting Gifts baseline values using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Implements Accepting Gifts session logic including ball count clamping, attempt updates, and set progression.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Contains APA skill-level utilities including required points-to-win mapping and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines APA 9-ball match point conversion charts mapping loser points to match point outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Defines APA 9-ball scoring models and utilities for rack validation, PPI calculation, and player stat aggregation.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Creates APA 9-ball match records, generating IDs, timestamps, player stats, and rack summaries for persistence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages the active Accepting Gifts drill session, handling scoring, state progression, persistence, and match saving.
Displays the rules and structure of the Accepting Gifts drill.
Initializes a new Accepting Gifts session, handling player input, baseline loading, and session setup.
Controls APA 9-ball practice matches, tracking racks, cumulative stats, completion state, and saving results.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: UI for starting an APA 9‑ball practice match by entering player names, skill levels, and notes, then saving initial game state to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays details for a selected match, including players, mode‑specific info, and deletion, using match data fetched by ID.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Lists all saved matches with filtering by mode and navigation to match details, pulling data from useGetAllMatches.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with navigation cards for different game modes and match history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Runs the Straight Shot drill, updating strokes and events in sessionStorage and saving the match when finished.
Static rules panel describing objectives and scoring for the Straight Shot drill.
Start screen for the Straight Shot drill, collecting player info, showing moving average, and initializing session state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and clear parameters from session or URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project's frontend styling.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s versioned state, feature set, rules for pool scoring modes, architectural notes, and known issues.
